data.description:
OVERAY STUDIO is not just another virtual workspace; it's a fusion of immersive experience and practicality, tailored for both professionals and enthusiasts. At its core, this platform provides access to essential features completely free of charge. Users can effortlessly integrate up to two virtual monitors, enjoying the freedom to customize their spatial layout or opt for our handy preset configurations. The software seamlessly syncs with Windows, ensuring an automatic match with your monitor layout for a frictionless experience.

Boasting an intuitive user interface, controlling your spatially arranged monitors becomes second nature. Paired with user-friendly passthrough capabilities, you can immerse yourself in a variety of virtual spaces provided at no additional cost, turning mundane tasks into engaging experiences.

While OVERAY STUDIO is currently in its beta phase and there may be areas awaiting refinement, your support fuels our passion. We're committed to enhancing the platform, with upcoming features set to redefine the PC-VR integration landscape. Dive into the future of productivity with OVERAY STUDIO, and be a part of this pioneering journey.

changelog.change_log:
New Features:

 - Space Theme: Now you can control features specific to each space. Please adjust the color of the Void map and the sound of Forest Cabin. (More options coming soon)

Usability Updates:

 - Enhanced Usability: Redesigned the entire UI panel layout.
 - Always Load Last Settings: Under Settings > Preference, there is now an option at the bottom to always load the last settings without a dialog.
 - Bug Fixes: Fixed an issue where the monitor was not displaying, among other discovered bugs.

New Features:
- Custom Gate: Set up to 5 Passthrough gates in desired spaces.
- Virtual Monitor Display Brightness Control: Adjust the brightness of the virtual monitor.

Usability Updates:
- New UI: Redesigned the entire UI panel layout.
- Save and Load Last Layout Setting: Load the layout settings from the last session.
- Long Press Main Menu:
  Previous: The menu bar appears in front of the user with each menu click.
  Now: The menu bar appears at its last position with a menu click, and is placed in front of the user with a long press.
Fix minor bugs and optimize performance

- Fix intermittent shutdown
- Fix minor bugs

- Improve pairing delay time
- Fix intermittent shutdown
- Fix UI component

- Fix Meta Quest Pro controller material missing issue
- Fix display arrange exception
- Fix minor bugs
- Enhance performance
Fix update contents issue and minor bugs
Resolved a connection bug related to pc sync issues.
Resolved a minor bug related to display board movement issues.
Resolved a minor bug related to display board movement issues.
Resolved a minor bug related to display board movement issues.
